text:
Quick update on signage: we have some work to do to get ready to pull the trigger on ordering / install, as well as a few decisions to be made. Current plan is to work on those items and get together a list of questions/decisions so we can all regroup and bottom out on them at our next meeting. 

So we likely won't be ordering and planning for install until early next week. If anyone has questions or concerns, feel free to ping me.
Sounds good. Thanks for update. Holler if there's anything anybody can help with!
